page.title: 10LEISURE IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
APART FROM SKITTLES,{TRADITIONAL {COUNTRY PASTIMES}PROVED TO HAVE VERY FEW FOLLOWERS. LESS THAN TWO PERCENT OF THOSE SURVEYED GAVE{HUNTING}OR {BELL-RINGING}AS THEIR INTERESTS. THREE PERCENT MENTIONED{HORSE-RIDING,}WHILE {FISHING, SHOOTING}AND THE BREEDING OF {WORKING DOGS,HORSES}OR{CATTLE}AS HOBBIES WERE VERY LOW IN POPULARITY.
SIXTEEN DIFFERENT{PHYSICAL {ACTIVITIES}WERE MENTIONED, AND FORTY PERCENT OF THOSE INTERVIEWED ENJOYED AT LEAST ONE SUCH LEISURE PURSUIT. {WALKING, CRICKET, SQUASH, SWIMMING, {GOLF, FOOTBALL, TENNIS, BADMINTON,}AND {RUGBY}WERE THE SPORTS OR ACTIVITIES MOST FREQUENTLY MENTIONED.
